rule: If "Unknown" is chosen as the output, it must signify the word has a recognizable part of speech, but does not align with the provided list specifically.
complianceText:
The chatbot outputs a part-of-speech tag (JJS) followed by a word ("Cela"). The description asks for returning only the part-of-speech tag. Therefore, including the word "Cela" violates the description.
ERR
